content: For the fourth quarter, total net sales increased 1.7% to $383.3 million in comparison to the fourth quarter of fiscal 2021 and reflected a 2-year sales increase of 22.5% compared to the fourth quarter of 2020. In the current year fourth quarter, we generated $23.1 million of GAAP operating income or 6% of net sales compared to $31 million or 8.2% of net sales in the prior year fourth quarter. Excluding all non-GAAP adjustments in the prior fiscal year, our current year operating income of $228.2 million, representing 13.5% of net sales is comparable to adjusted operating income of $141.4 million or 10% of net sales in fiscal '21.
